title: Pieces of Us
description: There's a time in life where you need to be selfish.A time where you need to make a sacrifice.A point in life where you find yourself at a crossroads.Knowing that whichever path you choose, someone will end up hurting.I'm stuck with this predicament.Am I selfish enough not to care?Or am I selfless enough to sacrifice my own happiness? Hurting the only man that had me--body and soul.
author: Pamela Ann
